transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hanji.

Executive: Hello good evening.

Customer: Good evening sir.

Executive: Sir aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi clear.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Mam aawaz abhi nahi aa rahi aapko.

Executive: Hanji hanji sir.

Executive: Mam main Shadab bol raha India Mart se account manager mam.

Executive: Hanji hanji sir.

Executive: Mam sir se meri kal baat hui thi.

Executive: Wo bol rahe the ki mere paas call nahi aa rahi buyer ki.

Executive: Hanji hanji sir.

Executive: To kal mam yaha pe maine ticket raise kiya tha ticket raise karne ke baad fir discussion hua tha to true caller waha pe create karwaye gaye the.

Executive: To kyuki aapke paas bhi call aati hai to mam aapke paas true caller hai abhi ki delete kar diya aapne.

Executive: Nahi nahi sir abhi to delete kar diya.

Executive: Ha to sir bol rahe the ki main kisi aur dusre number pe call karke check karunga ki mere paas call aa rahi ki nahi aa rahi to unhone check kiya tha.

Customer: Uh sir main na darasal kal office gayi nahi thi chutti par thi main.

Executive: Mam main aaj ki baat kar raha hu mam.

Customer: Sir aaj bhi main chutti par hi hu kyuki meri tabiyat nahi theek hai.

Executive: Okay mam theek hai kya halat hai.

Executive: Kyuki mam unhe bhi pata hai unhe bhi apne lagta hai.

Executive: Ha to waha se waha se call aa raha hai yaha tak ki maine Roj sir ko bhi call kiya tha.

Customer: Ha ji ha ji.

Executive: Wo shayad busy hi honge wo busy honge to unhone call pick nahi kiya main do bar call kar chuka hu unko ek subah ek bar kiya tha dusri bar abhi sham me kiya tha to fir maine secondary number pe call kiya aapko.

Customer: Hanji hanji sir.

Executive: Ki waha pe sir abhi bhi matlab koi call is number par bhi nahi aa rahi hai India Mart ki.

Executive: Matlab is number pe aapko nahi aa rahi thi ha.

Customer: Nahi sir.

Executive: Nahi mam to ye abhi correction hua hai ab correction hone ke baad mam iska calls wagera jo hongi wo aane lagegi lagengi mam ek cheez sir ne mujhe ye bola tha ki wo jo true caller hai na.

Executive: Ji.

Executive: Usko delete kar do uski wajah se na koi call nahi aa rahi India Mart se aapko.

Executive: Ha mam uski wajah se mam yaha pe tha aur dusri cheez ye hai ki ek number hai mam main usko aapko bata deta hu usko aap save kar lijiye kyuki jo buyer ki taraf se call aati hai na.

Customer: Jo aapka official number hai sir ne mujhe kal ek number diya bhi tha 79 kuch.

Executive: 079 kuch something tha kya.

Customer: Sir do minute wait karo main batati hu aapko.

Executive: Okay okay.

Customer: 7942554266.

Executive: Ek second mam main dekh leta hu aapko bata bhi deta hu match bhi kar lijiyega aap.

Customer: Hanji.

Executive: Yaha se bhi open kar leta hu.

Executive: Ji usko.

Customer: Hanji sir.

Executive: Mam number repeat kar dijiye.

Customer: 7942554266.

Executive: Nahi mam ye nahi hai mam 07942 mam ye number hai bata raha hu aapko mam note kariye usko.

Customer: Do minute wait sir.

Executive: Ye number number hai.

Executive: Main aapko number bata raha hu isme.

Customer: Repeat karo sir.

Executive: Zero.

Customer: Zero.

Executive: 79

Customer: 79

Executive: 42

Customer: 42

Executive: 54

Customer: 54

Executive: 56

Customer: 56

Executive: 38

Customer: Sir aapki na aawaz nahi aa rahi beech beech cut cut kar kar aa rahi hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Customer's voice is breaking during the call.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed a correction was made.

- Executive provided an official IndiaMART number.

- Executive asked to delete Truecaller app.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, truecaller, official number, technical issue
